info.name: Kumele API
info.description:
Kumele Backend API - Social Meetup/Hobby Matching Application

## Base URL
- **Production**: https://kumele-api-37cf.onrender.com
- **Local**: http://localhost:3000

## Authentication
Most endpoints require a Bearer token. Use `/auth/signup` or `/auth/login` to get tokens.

## Features
- User authentication (JWT, Google OAuth, Passkeys)
- Event creation and management
- Real-time chat (WebSocket)
- Payment processing (Stripe)
- Reward system (Bronze/Silver/Gold badges)

request.description: Simple health endpoint for load balancers and quick checks
Full health check including database and Redis status
